MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA17 postcode area of Darvel, affecting properties in Loudoun Avenue and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.55pm. Our engineers have arrived the Priestland Villiage substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5pm on Wednesday 17 February 2021.
